thread.title: New DoomEdit Clean Particles pak file download

post.author: Eutectic
post.body:
Here's a new Clean PAK file patch for DoomEdit. This ones removes the broken particles (commented out in the .prt files) from the Particles list in the media window. There weren't that many (around 36) but I figured I might as well do it.

Download:
Clean Particles PAK Version 1

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
My god!

Somebody slow Eutectic down before he burns himself out.

post.author: Mordenkainen
post.body:
I think we need a "Clean Stuff" thread with links to all modded files. It's starting to get harder to keep track of everything.

P.S. Most excellent work man.
